page.title: 19Bus Routes on the B2116
page.content: The buses that go along the B2116 road go from the bus station in East Gate Street,Lewes.Three buses go along this road to Haywards Heath and Hassocks via Plumpton.The 124 bus goes to Hassocks.There is also the 66 coach route that goes to Haywards Heath. These are all single decker buses. The driver collects the money.They do not have a seperate conductor. Approximately 40 people use the bus each day. The Village Rider,a small bus that only carries 16 people also uses this route.It has a special lift at the back of the bus for disabled and elderly people.The Village Rider goes along this road 3 times a day. The 66 coach goes along the road both ways 3 times a day. The 124 bus goes along the road twice in each direction each day.
